title: Will there be a ranked5s for is that new dynamic Q?
body:
Will there be a ranked5s for is that new dynamic Q?
Will there be a ranked5s for is that new dynamic Q?
Will there be a ranked5s for is that new dynamic Q?
Will there be a ranked5s for is that new dynamic Q?
Will there be a ranked5s for is that new dynamic Q?

replies.body: The time to play in a ranked environment with any / all of your friends has come to an end. It truly sucks donkey penis.
Dynamic Queue has completely replaced Team Ranked. Most ranked rewards will be moved to Dynamic Queue, and Riot will be implementing a Solo only queue later.

if this is the case, will it be changed that we can dynamic que with people that are more than 1 tier above us? 

I was so excited for reviving my ranked team with my friends but they're all plat and i'm a lil bronzie :'(
I doubt it, but I can't say with absolute certainty. They are probably still making big decisions around Dynamic Queue.
